tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_profiles (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    game_id INT,
    level INT,
    experience INT
)

CREATE TABLE player_statistics (
    player_id INT,
    game_id INT,
    kills INT,
    deaths INT,
    assists INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_profiles(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PlayerProfiles (
    player_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    avatar_url VARCHAR(200),
    date_joined TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE GameStats (
    player_id UUID REFERENCES PlayerProfiles(player_id),
    game_id UUID,
    score INTEGER,
    level INTEGER,
    time_played INTERVAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id, game_id)
);

CREATE TABLE GameSessions (
    session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID REFERENCES PlayerProfiles(player_id),
    game_id UUID,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE PlayerStatistics (
  player_id INT REFERENCES PlayerProfiles(id),
  game_id INT,
  score INT,
  level INT,
  time_played INT
);

CREATE TABLE player_statistics (
    player_id INT,
    games_played INT,
    total_score INT,
    highest_score INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_profiles(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE game_sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_profiles(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_rewards (
    reward_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    reward_name VARCHAR(50),
    reward_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_profiles(player_id)
);
